column5: Been snowing for 24 hours straight now...super heavy, heart attack snow. Got about 20 or more cm so far. No plows in site, of course!! Still coming down good!

We got it off the lake last night as well.. drifts to 1.5 feet around the house and hanger. I spent 3+ hours plowing the laneway.... even buried the truck and had to get the backhoe running to pull it out of the snow bank..
Rick, did you happen to scout around for fresh yote tracks?
need some of that damn stuff up here!!!!! not even a 1cm so far!!!! lol.
speakin of those buggers, they had my buddies friends dog for breakfast earlier this week. what a site. a trail of blood and paw prints followed by a bunch of prints and a half eatin dog....

Unfortunately, we all better get used to it. Any animals outside are at risk now. Lots of pets here killed or 'missing'. I will be out Monday Roy...once the snow stops...they don't move much or far during storms.
